title: Who else has played with this sort of player?

embed.description: kaboomblah / Gold 2 68LP / 144W 145L Win Ratio 50% / Malphite - 21W 20L Win Ratio 51%, Thresh - 19W 17L Win Ratio 53%, Twisted Fate - 17W 9L Win Ratio 65%, Ahri - 16W 8L Win Ratio 67%, Sivir - 9W 11L Win Ratio 45%

body:
So played a game as [adc]. Had a [mid] who decided it was going to AFK-but-not-really-have-the-balls.

You know, the old: don't contribute, but move around the fountain so they don't get detected.

He wanted blue, [jungle] didn't want to give it, so smote it away. Short story: self-entitlement got the better of him, and decided to punish us.

What is the worst, complete piece of shit behaviour you've encountered while playing LoL?

replies.body:
The stereotypical silver.
AFKing, inting, throwing 4 da lulz.
